member.name: T:WindowsApp1.Form1
member.summary: Created by Nigel Mansell Date: 9/3/2017 This Program uses 6 buttons linked to 6 states along with a clear and exit button. The six will display the states flag, capital, and abbreviation of the state.Flag pictures are taken from http://www.50states.com/flag/

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.VirginiaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the Virgina flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.NorthCarolinaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the North Carolina flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.SouthCarolinaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the South Carolina flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.GeorgiaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the Georgia flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.AlabamaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the Alabama flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.FloridaButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button displays the Florida flag, its capital, and abbreviation.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.ClearButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button clears the picturebox as well as the capital and abbreviatiion label.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.Form1.ExitButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button exits out of the application.
